process.llm_response: Group A features everyday scenes and objects, while Group B focuses on events and people in formal settings.

英語で5-10単語程度で、グループAに特徴的でグループBには見られない主要な違いを簡潔に回答してください。

回答：
evaluation.candidate_text: Group A features everyday scenes and objects, while Group B focuses on events and people in formal settings.
